segments.text: I'm watching this scene unfold, and I can't shake a feeling of unease.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The running water seems so calm, yet it's creating such a hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle beneath the woman's feet is just going to grow and grow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredibly sad to think of the water damage that will occur.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she's so utterly unaware, focused on a simple plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, adding another layer of danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is teetering on the brink, it really looks like it will tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I imagine the crash, the sound of glass breaking, the screams.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me quite upset to see such easily avoidable risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If someone slips on that wet floor, they could be seriously hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these small actions are building up to a big problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calmness of the exterior view through the window only heightens the internal tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would notice and stop the impending accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
